column1: #text=Today I decided to pick out a book from the library .
#text=I got in my car and drove a couple of miles from my house down to the library .
#text=I began by looking through the fiction section .
#text=I scanned the rows of books for familiar author names or interesting titles .
#text=I picked up a few books and read the first page or so of each one .
#text=Once I found one that looked like it would be a good read , I picked it up and took it over to the front counter .
#text=There was a short line , so I waited while other people signed up for library cards and checked out books .
#text=Once I arrived at the counter , the librarian took my book and scanned it .
#text=She told me it would be due two weeks from now , and gave me a receipt .
#text=I thanked her and exited the library .
